name: Rebound (itch) (Resurrection Games)
description:
Keep the ball in the boundary and rebound as many times as you can.

Controls for rebound are simple!

You have three paddles to stop the ball.

Left tap holds the left paddle: Green
Right Tap holds the right paddle: Blue
Two finger tap holds the center paddle: Red

Hold the ball for the highest number of rebounds and brag among your friends.
